reviewText: These courses are absolutely wonderful.  Full of great content, professors that don't drone on and on monotone, and helpful photos, diagrams, etc.  it's all the fun stuff of a college course, without the tests or notetaking.  I used to watch Modern Marvels and How It's Made, but those programs aren't produced anymore.  The Great Courses are wonderful for continuing to fill the mind with stuff about how the world worked in the past and works today.
Very ambitious topic.  Thoughtfully presented with an excellent balance of technical and cultural details.

Just fabulous!  Of course, this is the kind of course that only certain types of people are going enjoy.  However, if you want a rather "in detail" descriptions of most of the elements of economics theory and activity that have combined to make our world, Prof. Harreld is worth listening to.
Very informative and well presented.  I found it interesting and entertaining.
Very uninspiring and boring presenter. Speaks very general, could do with more exemplifications to make it more exiting. Not on the same level as Niall Ferguson.
Shipment and item in excellent condition
